ext_descriptions.ext_description:
The alias_assignment_is_valid function evaluates wheher an instance of applied_identification_assignment whose identification role is 'alias', contains, in its items attribute, only instances of types listed in aliasable_item.
The function returns TRUE is the role is not 'alias' or if the items attribute only contains instances of types listed in aliasable_item.
The instance of applied_identification_assignment, the validity of which is assessed.

The alias_assignment_is_valid rule ensures that all instances of applied_identification_assignment whose identification role is 'alias', contains, in their items attribute, only instances of types listed in aliasable_item.
